plugin.name: tagbar
plugin.adopt: This module works with exuberant ctags, and not with gnu version. In AD-Opt environment, the default version is the last one. The workaround is to install the exuberant version into your $HOME/bin folder. Thus, gcmtags script will use that version, because aliases do not work with find -exec command.
